hackathon-description-text: Samsung Developers wants to help developers like you build the best appsfor the world’s greatest devices!
hackathon-eligibility: Must integrate Chord SDK and register at SmartAppChallenge.com to qualify for $800,000 in prizes.
hackathon-rules:
You can start preparing your ideas, mockups, logo, etc. before the event. However you cannot start coding until the event starts.

We all start coding at the same time.

In oder to make sure that everything was built at the hackathon winning teams will be subject to a code-review.
 
Teams fully own everything they build at the hackathon.
 
Teams can have up to 5 people.

Create an example of a solution to a problem that can’t be easily found anywhere else.
 
Every project will have its own ChallengePost.com page and each team must post their hack by 1:00pm on Sunday.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1st place, best app with haptics:  Samsung Galaxy S4
Best app using Samsung Chord and Haptics:  Samsung Galaxy S4 (for developers who register for the Samsung Smart App Challenge
Runner-up, best app with haptics:  Samsung Galaxy Note 8 tablet
Tickets to the Samsung Developers Conference

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2211 North 1st Street, San Jose, CA 95131, USA
hackathon-location-address: 2211 North 1st Street, San Jose, CA 95131, USA
hackathon-description-header: Smart App Challenge $800,000 in prizes for Chord SDK
